FindingName: VULNERABLE - CustomerLockbox Feature is disabled and could lead to data spillage and exfiltration!
Description: You should enable the Customer Lockbox feature. It requires Microsoft to get your approval for any datacenter operation that grants a Microsoft support engineer or other employee direct access to any of your data.

References.Text: 3.1 Establish and Maintain a Data Management Process
3.13 Deploy a Data Loss Prevention Solution
13.3 Monitor and Block Unauthorized Network Traffic
